message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and your interest, I propose a price of $14000 for it. This offer takes into account both the product's worth and your perceived value, aiming for a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually beneficial solution. However, based on my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $13500 for the product. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. To further explore possibilities, I would like to propose a price of $13750 for the product. This offer aims to provide a slight increase from your counteroffer while still being mindful of your budget constraints. I look forward to your consideration.

I appreciate your effort, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still constrained by my budget. Could we possibly negotiate down to $13500? I believe this might be a fair compromise given the circumstances.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your budget constraints. In an attempt to reach a satisfactory agreement, I propose a final offer of $13625 for the product. This amount slightly exceeds your previous offer but aims to bring us closer to a mutually beneficial outcome. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.

Alice, thank you for your continued efforts. I truly appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I am proposing a final offer of $13500. I believe this offers a fair compromise and I hope you can accept this proposal.
